column5: looking at paquettes camp for my next fishing trip for 12 guys. hows the fishing and the lodge? any other sugestions for lodges?
Keep driving down the road past Paquettes to Happy Day Lodge on Windermere lake.  It's 10,000 times better.
Anjigami lake lodge.  http://www.campanjigami.com/gallery/fish/index.php?gazpart=show&gazgal=15  you can even run the ATV's down the road to Dosier...best spec fishing ever
Except for tucking you in bed at night, you've been getting perhaps the best advice that anyone in Ontario can offer you. Take it and run with it before it's gone.
yes i have and now i have a list of about  four lodges i have to decide from. osullivans rainbow,shining tree camp,camp anjigami and green wilderness resort

O'Sullivan's Rainbow and Happy Day are in an entirely different stratosphere compared to your other choices.  They're also both very popular and booked far in advance (for good reason).  Between the two Happy Day has superior cabins and good fishing on a big beautiful lake.  O'Sullivan has adequate cabins and amazing fishing on a big beautiful lake.
